title: Build and explore Knowledge Graphs faster with Amazon Neptune using Graph.Build and G.V() – Part 1
text: This is a guest blog post by Richard Loveday, Head of Product at Graph.Build, in partnership with Charles Ivie, Graph Architect at AWS. The Graph.Build platform is a dedicated, no-code graph model design studio and build factory, available on AWS Marketplace. Knowledge graphs have been widely adopted by organizations, powering use cases such as social […]
